name: Light In The Dark (itch) (DarkAngelZxZ)
description:
Light in the dark is a short game about a hunter and his familiar combating the darkness. The hunter is unable to fight alone as he needs his familiar to boost his strength and speed. Be careful though as the darkness gains speed along with you and your familiar.

This game was made for the 5th official Brackeys Game Jam. Please remember to leave a comment on if I should expand on this idea and where you believe I may improve it as well.
